posts.title: 经验总结
posts.text: 一日之计在于晨！早晨是埋头苦读的时候 晚上要集中精力，效率也可以很高 以后对电脑的操作应尽量放在下午做

posts.title: 笔记
posts.text: 虚拟机链接本机数据库： 1mysql -uroot -pXXX -P 3306 -h 192.168.43.116 grant all privileges on . to 报错问题:https://www.cnblogs.com/cqdxwjd/p/9925051.html 配置seetaface2：https://blog.csdn.net/TotoroCyx/article/details/80852012 xshell:https://www.linuxidc.com/Linux/2017-12/149795.htm Qtlinux安装Qt：https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/169308877 QFile: 1234567891011121314151617connect(ui->selectFile,&QPushButton::clicked,[=](){ QString path = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,"打开文件"); if (path.isEmpty()) { QMessageBox::critical(this,"错误","文件打开错误"); } else{ ui->lineEdit->setText(path); //QFile 默认编码格式 Utf-8 //QTextCodec * code = QTextCodec::codecForName("gbk"); QFile file(path); file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly); QByteArray array = file.readAll(); ui->textEdit->setText(array); //ui->textEdit->setText(code->toUnicode(array)); } }); 不规则物体移动 12345678910111213141516void Widget::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event){ if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton) { //获取差值 m_point = event->globalPos() - this->frameGeometry().topLeft(); } else if (event->button() == Qt::RightButton){ this->close(); }}void Widget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event){ this->move(event->globalPos() - m_point);} 表头 表头 表头 a1 s s a2 a b 1234567st=>start: 开始op=>operation: 操作cond=>condition: 确定？e=>end: 结束st->op->condcond(yes)->econd(no)->op

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: SeetaFace2
posts.text: 今天成功运行SeetaFace2，值得纪念！ 主要问题：照片应该和可执行文件放在同一级目录编译只需要在bin目录下make即可 ———————————————————————————————————另外还学了学怎么在hexo上放图片哈哈哈哈~ 123![celeste](celeste2.jpg){% asset_img SF_example.png SeetaFace2人脸识别例子 %} hexo放置图片参考链接： https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_34348805/article/details/91389277https://blog.csdn.net/xjm850552586/article/details/84101345 new Valine({ el: '#vcomments', appId: 'cWzvFtxi1eXy0iwnLqSbl4P4-gzGzoHsz', appKey: 'aBxXrdT0g6OyCvqeUuQ9nVcO', visitor: true })
